description: News about Michel Marriott, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Michel Marriott
title_page: Michel Marriott - The New York Times
maintext:
Keeping Your Cool . . . Staying in Town;The Crosstown Bus
The city whispers on summer weekends -- it's a lover saying, "Come discover what I really am." I lick triple-scoop ice cream cones, look at great paintings and slide into Off Broadway shows, but my favorite activities are completely passive.
